actions.name: CreateAnomalyMonitor
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new Anomaly Monitor

actions.name: CreateAnomalySubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new Anomaly Subscription

actions.name: CreateCostCategoryDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new Cost Category with the requested name and rules

actions.name: CreateNotificationSubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to create Reservation expiration alerts

actions.name: CreateReport
actions.description: Grants permission to create Cost Explorer Reports

actions.name: DeleteAnomalyMonitor
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Anomaly Monitor

actions.name: DeleteAnomalySubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Anomaly Subscription

actions.name: DeleteCostCategoryDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a Cost Category

actions.name: DeleteNotificationSubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to delete Reservation expiration alerts

actions.name: DeleteReport
actions.description: Grants permission to delete Cost Explorer Reports

actions.name: DescribeCostCategoryDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptions such as the name, ARN, rules, definition, and effective dates of a Cost Category

actions.name: DescribeNotificationSubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to view Reservation expiration alerts

actions.name: DescribeReport
actions.description: Grants permission to view Cost Explorer Reports page

actions.name: GetAnomalies
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve anomalies

actions.name: GetAnomalyMonitors
actions.description: Grants permission to query Anomaly Monitors

actions.name: GetAnomalySubscriptions
actions.description: Grants permission to query Anomaly Subscriptions

actions.name: GetConsoleActionSetEnforced
actions.description: Grants permission to view whether existing or fine-grained IAM actions are being used to control authorization to Billing, Cost Management, and Account consoles

actions.name: GetCostAndUsage
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the cost and usage metrics for your account

actions.name: GetCostAndUsageWithResources
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the cost and usage metrics with resources for your account

actions.name: GetCostCategories
actions.description: Grants permission to query Cost Catagory names and values for a specified time period

actions.name: GetCostForecast
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a cost forecast for a forecast time period

actions.name: GetDimensionValues
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all available filter values for a filter for a period of time

actions.name: GetPreferences
actions.description: Grants permission to view Cost Explorer Preferences page

actions.name: GetReservationCoverage
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the reservation coverage for your account

actions.name: GetReservationPurchaseRecommendation
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the reservation recommendations for your account

actions.name: GetReservationUtilization
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the reservation utilization for your account

actions.name: GetRightsizingRecommendation
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the rightsizing recommendations for your account

actions.name: GetSavingsPlansCoverage
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the Savings Plans coverage for your account

actions.name: GetSavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendation
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the Savings Plans recommendations for your account

actions.name: GetSavingsPlansUtilization
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the Savings Plans utilization for your account

actions.name: GetSavingsPlansUtilizationDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the Savings Plans utilization details for your account

actions.name: GetTags
actions.description: Grants permission to query tags for a specified time period

actions.name: GetUsageForecast
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a usage forecast for a forecast time period

actions.name: ListCostAllocationTags
actions.description: Grants permission to list Cost Allocation Tags

actions.name: ListCostCategoryDefinitions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve names, ARN, and effective dates for all Cost Categories

actions.name: ListSavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationGeneration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of your historical recommendation generations

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for a Cost Explorer resource

actions.name: ProvideAnomalyFeedback
actions.description: Grants permission to provide feedback on detected anomalies

actions.name: StartSavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendationGeneration
actions.description: Grants permission to request a Savings Plans recommendation generation

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag a Cost Explorer resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a Cost Explorer resource

actions.name: UpdateAnomalyMonitor
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing Anomaly Monitor

actions.name: UpdateAnomalySubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing Anomaly Subscription

actions.name: UpdateConsoleActionSetEnforced
actions.description: Grants permission to change whether existing or fine-grained IAM actions will be used to control authorization to Billing, Cost Management, and Account consoles

actions.name: UpdateCostAllocationTagsStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to update existing Cost Allocation Tags status

actions.name: UpdateCostCategoryDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing Cost Category

actions.name: UpdateNotificationSubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to update Reservation expiration alerts

actions.name: UpdatePreferences
actions.description: Grants permission to edit Cost Explorer Preferences page

actions.name: UpdateReport
actions.description: Grants permission to update Cost Explorer Reports
